title: I Tried Gaming On The New Snapdragon X Windows ARM Laptop...
description: Today's video is *sponsored* by Micro Center. Check out their New Customer Exclusive for $25 Off ALL Processors:   With the launch of the new snapdragon laptops for windows, I had to try gaming on it. It retails for US$999 - amazon affiliate link here:   Micro Center Charlotte is Officially OPEN  Shop Location Exclusive Deals:  Sign Up for Early Access to Micro Center Miami:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
transcript: this is the new Microsoft Surface laptop. Something which normally would be about as exciting as a PowerPoint update but what lives inside this laptop could Herald in the windows arm-mageddon. wow that was really bad and while you recover 14-in high resolution touch display in it which is behind what feels like a glass surface that is very reflective but it's it's a really nice display it measures very well and because I'm going to try and game on this poor helpless little thing hopefully the display's motion rendering is better than a Macbook which is put to shame by an EXA sketch but none of that's super interesting the main thing in it the Snapdragon chip is Arm based like apple silicon chips and likely the processor powering the phone that you're watching this video on which is awesome because arm CPUs tend to be very that doesn't know what arm is like most video games in fact probably all of the good ones as far as I know that was a comment specifically for all you arm-based console enjoyers that are probably
